CustomField.description: Overall Number of (soft-credit) gifts made by this Account. See "Combined Total Number of Gifts" for overall number of gifts (i.e. hard or soft credit) from this Account. Calculated by NPSP Customizable Rollup.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Overall Number of (soft-credit) gifts made by this Account. See "Combined Total Number of Gifts" for overall number of gifts (i.e. hard or soft credit) from this Account. Calculated by NPSP Customizable Rollup.
CustomField.label: Total Number of Soft Credit Gifts
